attributes.action: Reduce, proportionally, the amount of overseas aid given to countries which divert parts of their own GDP to fund, neuclear arms and or space exploration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: India and Pakistan, accept substantial amounts of overseas development aid freeing an equivalent amount to the pursuit of a neuclear arms program and in the case of India space exploration. This money should either be used in the UK or diverted to more deserving countries
